ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Update of Aeryl mod for RimWorld 1.1 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=843504745
Support-chat: https://discord.gg/SuhwVpM
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/TemperatureGauge
Added a wall-mounted thermometer, since people asked for it and I liked the idea!
--- Original Description --- Adds a simple buildable thermometer that displays the current ambient temperature and can be configured to provide temperature based alerts. You can set it to alert you when a room gets too hot or cold. If you have ever had food rot in a freezer or plants die in your greenhouse because you forgot to check the temperature, this mod is for you. Also includes a configurable temperature-sensitive power switch.
Not compatible with Parallel Power Grid.
